title: Towards sustainable landscapes: Implementing participatory approaches in contract design for biodiversity preservation and ecosystem services in Europe
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 160

Author(s): Inés Gutiérrez-Briceño, Marina García-Llorente, Francis Turkelboom, Dieter Mortelmans, Sven Defrijn, Carolina Yacamán-Ochoa, Saskia Wanner, Jennifer Dodsworth, Birte Bredemeier, Céline Dutilly, Eszter Kelemen, Boldizsár Megyesi, Erling Andersen, Didier Buffière, Corinne Eychenne, Anne Siegert
